title: Introduction to Figma
description: Learn the basics of Figma, its interface, and how to create a new project, including setting up your account, understanding the toolbar, and navigating the workspace

steps.title: Set up your Figma account
steps.instruction: Go to www.figma.com, click 'Get started', enter your details, and complete a quick verification activity
steps.finished_criteria: The Figma dashboard appears with a few onboarding questions

steps.title: Create a new project
steps.instruction: Click the 'New Project' button on the Figma dashboard
steps.finished_criteria: A new project file opens with a blank canvas and a layers panel

steps.title: Enable rulers
steps.instruction: Open the Main menu, hover over 'View', and select 'Rulers'
steps.finished_criteria: Rulers appear on the top and left side of the canvas

steps.title: Create a new frame
steps.instruction: Click and drag on the canvas to create a new frame
steps.finished_criteria: A blue rectangle appears on the canvas and a new frame named 'Frame 1' appears in the layers panel

steps.title: Add a rectangle layer
steps.instruction: Click the 'Rectangle' tool in the toolbar and click and drag on the canvas to create a new rectangle
steps.finished_criteria: A new rectangle layer appears on the canvas and in the layers panel

steps.title: Use the Arrange and Align commands
steps.instruction: Select the rectangle layer, go to the 'Arrange' menu, and select 'Align' to center the rectangle horizontally and vertically
steps.finished_criteria: The rectangle is centered horizontally and vertically within the frame

steps.title: Zoom in and out
steps.instruction: Use the zoom controls in the toolbar or the keyboard shortcuts to zoom in and out of the canvas
steps.finished_criteria: The canvas zooms in and out, and the rectangle and frame appear larger or smaller

title: Design Fundamentals
description: Understand the principles of design, including typography, color theory, and layout, and learn how to apply them in Figma to create visually appealing designs

steps.title: Enable Rulers
steps.instruction: Open the Main menu, hover over View, and select Rulers to enable rulers on the canvas.
steps.finished_criteria: The rulers are displayed on the top and left side of the canvas.

steps.title: Create a New Guide
steps.instruction: Click and drag on the horizontal or vertical ruler to pull a guide onto the canvas.
steps.finished_criteria: A new guide appears on the canvas, indicated by a dotted line.

steps.title: Create a New Frame
steps.instruction: Use the Rectangle tool to draw a new frame on the canvas.
steps.finished_criteria: A new frame appears on the canvas, with a blue border indicating it is selected.

steps.title: Add Text to the Frame
steps.instruction: Use the Text tool to add text to the new frame.
steps.finished_criteria: The text appears inside the frame, and the Layers panel shows a new text layer.

steps.title: Apply a Color Style
steps.instruction: Use the Color Picker to apply a color style to the text and frame.
steps.finished_criteria: The text and frame have the selected color applied, and the Styles panel shows a new color style.

steps.title: Use Auto Layout
steps.instruction: Toggle on Auto Layout in the frame to arrange the text and other layers automatically.
steps.finished_criteria: The layers inside the frame are arranged automatically, and the Auto Layout icon is displayed in the Layers panel.

steps.title: Create a Prototype
steps.instruction: Use the Prototype tool to connect the frame to another frame or screen.
steps.finished_criteria: A new prototype connection appears, indicated by a blue arrow, and the Prototype panel shows a new interaction.

title: Working with Objects and Layers
description: Discover how to create and manipulate objects, including shapes, text, and images, and learn how to organize them using layers, frames, and groups in Figma

steps.title: Create a New Frame
steps.instruction: Click on the Rectangle tool in the toolbar and drag it onto the canvas to create a new frame
steps.finished_criteria: A new frame named Frame 1 appears on the canvas

steps.title: Add Text to the Frame
steps.instruction: Select the Text tool and click inside the frame to add a new text layer
steps.finished_criteria: A new text layer with the text 'Text' appears inside the frame

steps.title: Arrange and Align Layers
steps.instruction: Use the Arrange and Align commands to position the text layer in the center of the frame
steps.finished_criteria: The text layer is centered both horizontally and vertically within the frame

steps.title: Create a New Guide
steps.instruction: Enable rulers and click and drag on the horizontal or vertical ruler to pull a guide onto the canvas
steps.finished_criteria: A new guide appears on the canvas, indicated by a dotted line

steps.title: Group Layers
steps.instruction: Select the frame and text layer, then right-click and select Group to group the layers
steps.finished_criteria: The frame and text layer are grouped together, indicated by a folder icon in the Layers panel

steps.title: Use Auto Layout
steps.instruction: Select the group and toggle on Auto Layout to enable automatic layout adjustments
steps.finished_criteria: The group's layout adjusts automatically, with the text layer centered within the frame

steps.title: Adjust Corner Radius and Smoothing
steps.instruction: Select the frame and adjust the corner radius and smoothing settings in the Properties panel
steps.finished_criteria: The frame's corners are rounded, with a smooth curve

title: User Interface Design
description: Learn how to design user interfaces using Figma, including creating wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs, and understand how to use Figma's built-in UI kits and plugins

steps.title: Create a New Frame
steps.instruction: Go to the Figma toolbar and click on the Frame tool, then drag and drop it onto the canvas to create a new frame
steps.finished_criteria: A new frame named Frame 1 appears on the canvas

steps.title: Add a Rectangle Layer
steps.instruction: Select the Rectangle tool from the Figma toolbar and draw a rectangle inside the newly created frame
steps.finished_criteria: A blue rectangle appears inside the frame on the canvas

steps.title: Enable Rulers and Add Guides
steps.instruction: Open the Main menu, hover over View, and select Rulers to enable rulers on the canvas, then click and drag on the horizontal or vertical ruler to pull a guide onto the canvas
steps.finished_criteria: Rulers appear on the top and left side of the canvas and a new guide is visible on the canvas

steps.title: Create Text Layer
steps.instruction: Select the Text tool from the Figma toolbar and click inside the frame to create a new text layer
steps.finished_criteria: A new text layer with a blinking cursor appears inside the frame on the canvas

steps.title: Use Auto Layout
steps.instruction: Select the frame and go to the right sidebar, then toggle on Auto Layout and adjust the horizontal and vertical flows
steps.finished_criteria: The frame's layers are rearranged according to the auto layout settings and the layers panel shows the updated frame structure

steps.title: Create a Prototype
steps.instruction: Go to the Prototype tab in the right sidebar, then click on the + button to create a new prototype and connect the frames
steps.finished_criteria: A new prototype is created and the frames are connected with arrows indicating the prototype flow

steps.title: Preview the Prototype
steps.instruction: Click on the Play button to preview the prototype and interact with the connected frames
steps.finished_criteria: The prototype is displayed in a new window and the frames can be interacted with as a functional app

title: Collaboration and Prototyping
description: Learn how to collaborate with others in Figma, including real-time commenting and editing, and discover how to create interactive prototypes to test and validate your designs

steps.title: Enable Rulers
steps.instruction: Open the Main menu, hover over View, and select Rulers to enable rulers on the canvas
steps.finished_criteria: The rulers are visible on the top and left side of the canvas

steps.title: Create a New Guide
steps.instruction: Click and drag on the horizontal or vertical ruler to pull a guide onto the canvas
steps.finished_criteria: A new guide appears on the canvas, indicated by a dotted line

steps.title: Create a New Frame
steps.instruction: Use the Frame tool to create a new frame on the canvas
steps.finished_criteria: A new frame appears on the canvas, with a blue border and a name like Frame 1

steps.title: Add a Comment
steps.instruction: Use the Comment tool to add a comment to the frame
steps.finished_criteria: A new comment appears on the canvas, with a speech bubble icon and the user's name

steps.title: Create a Prototype Connection
steps.instruction: Use the Prototype tool to create a connection between two frames
steps.finished_criteria: A new connection appears between the two frames, indicated by a blue arrow

steps.title: Preview the Prototype
steps.instruction: Use the Preview tool to view the prototype in presentation mode
steps.finished_criteria: The prototype is displayed in presentation mode, with the frames and connections visible

steps.title: Share the Prototype
steps.instruction: Use the Share tool to share the prototype with others
steps.finished_criteria: A share link is generated, and the prototype can be accessed by others
